channel.title: Help, I can't connect to my own server when its online!
channel.description:
I need help, for 3 days I have been trying to figure out my problem, I have asked the Owner of the main server i play on, I have been installing things for 3 days, caches, clients and sources. I can't get it to work. Everything is portforwarded and my firewall is off, along with exceptions for it. This is an LD 508.
Here is IP DUC: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=No-IPDUC1.jpg[/img]
Here is my Cache: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=Cache.jpg[/img]
I am using RubixScape508 Source, here is inside the folder: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=ServerFile.jpg[/img]
After that I click on Cmd and get here: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=InsideServer.jpg[/img]
Then I click on Runserver and get this: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=ServerStarted.jpg[/img]
Then I Go To My ScapeRune508 client: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=ScapeRuneClient.jpg[/img]
I double click start ScapeRune and get to here: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=LoadedClient.jpg[/img]
So I enter my username and password, and change the No-IP: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=Loading.jpg[/img]
Then, after a short while, I get this: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=Error.jpg[/img]
My Server CMD Says this: [img]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action-view&current=recieved.jpg[/img]
I dont get it, I've done what I've been taught. It gets a ping but nothing happens. I simply can't connect!
Also, the Server i play on, the admin checked it at google and the status said "Online". Yet why can't I connect. Help!
PS - I, in no way, own any of the sources listed here, full credit goes to them.
Help =[[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 02:28:18 am[/size][hr]The Pics aren't appearing, so here is the links
1st: No-IP DUC: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=No-IPDUC1.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=No-IPDUC1.jpg[/url]
2nd: Cache: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=Cache.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=Cache.jpg[/url]
3rd: RubixScape Server: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=ServerFile.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=ServerFile.jpg[/url]
4th: Inside CMD Folder: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=InsideServer.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=InsideServer.jpg[/url]
5th: Server Running: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=ServerStarted.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=ServerStarted.jpg[/url]
6th: Inside Client Folder: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=ScapeRuneClient.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=ScapeRuneClient.jpg[/url]
7th: Started Client: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=LoadedClient.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=LoadedClient.jpg[/url]
8th: Logging in Client: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=Loading.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=Loading.jpg[/url]
9th: Error: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=Error.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=Error.jpg[/url]
10th: Server Said Its Connecting: [url=http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=recieved.jpg]http://s469.photobucket.com/albums/rr60/deniedclub/?action=view&current=recieved.jpg[/url]
Help asap =] I love you guys, thanks for helping

WHICH IS 127.0.0.1
